item.title: Joy Yuill (1932-2008)
item.description:
as printed in the Marquette Mining Journal, April 22 2008. Joy and Baldy were neighbors of ours in Marquette. REPUBLIC â€” Joy Elizabeth Yuill, 75, of 11676 River Road, Republic, and former Marquette resident, entered eternal life Tuesday afternoon, April 15, 2008, at her home in the loving care of her family and the caregivers of Upper Peninsula Home Health & Hospice.
Born September 11, 1932, in Gaylord, the daughter of Stanley and Dorothy (Siegel) Yuill, Joy was raised in Vanderbilt and graduated from the Gaylord High School in 1949.
